verses.verse: בְּיָמָ֣יו <S%H3117><s%> In his days עָלָ֔ה <S%H5927><s%> came up נְבֻכַדְנֶאצַּ֖ר <S%H5019><s%> Nebuchadnezzar מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king בָּבֶ֑ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon וַיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> became ל֨וֹ יְהוֹיָקִ֥ים <S%H3079><s%> and Jehoiakim עֶ֙בֶד֙ <S%H5650><s%> became his servant שָׁלֹ֣שׁ <S%H7969><s%> three שָׁנִ֔ים <S%H8141><s%> years וַיָּ֖שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> then he turned וַיִּמְרָד־ <S%H4775><s%> and rebelled בּֽוֹ׃

וַיְשַׁלַּ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> sent יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD בּ֡וֹ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גְּדוּדֵ֣י <S%H1416><s%> against him bands כַשְׂדִּים֩ <S%H3778><s%> of the Chaldees וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גְּדוּדֵ֨י <S%H1416><s%> and bands אֲרָ֜ם <S%H758><s%> of the Syrians וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H853><s%> גְּדוּדֵ֣י <S%H1416><s%> and bands מוֹאָ֗ב <S%H4124><s%> of the Moabites וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> גְּדוּדֵ֣י <S%H1416><s%> and bands בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children עַמּ֔וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon וַיְשַׁלְּחֵ֥ם <S%H7971><s%> and sent בִּֽיהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> them against Judah לְהַֽאֲבִיד֑וֹ <S%H6><s%> to destroy כִּדְבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> it according to the word יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֔ר <S%H1696><s%> which he spake בְּיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> by עֲבָדָ֥יו <S%H5650><s%> his servants הַנְּבִיאִֽים׃ <S%H5030><s%> the prophets

אַ֣ךְ ׀ <S%H389><s%> Surely עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at פִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> Surely at the commandment יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הָֽיְתָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> came בִּֽיהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> came [this] upon Judah לְהָסִ֖יר <S%H5493><s%> to remove מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> from פָּנָ֑יו <S%H6440><s%> [them] out of his sight בְּחַטֹּ֣את <S%H2403><s%> for the sins מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh כְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> he עָשָֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> according to all that he did

וְגַ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> and also דַּֽם־ <S%H1818><s%> blood הַנָּקִי֙ <S%H5355><s%> And also for the innocent אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which שָׁפָ֔ךְ <S%H8210><s%> that he shed וַיְמַלֵּ֥א <S%H4390><s%> for he filled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem דָּ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> blood נָקִ֑י <S%H5355><s%> with innocent וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אָבָ֥ה <S%H14><s%> would יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD לִסְלֹֽחַ׃ <S%H5545><s%> not pardon

וְיֶ֛תֶר <S%H3499><s%> Now the rest דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> of the acts יְהוֹיָקִ֖ים <S%H3079><s%> of Jehoiakim וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> he עָשָׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> and all that he did הֲלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הֵ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> like כְּתוּבִ֗ים <S%H3789><s%> [are] they not written עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in סֵ֛פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in the book דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> of the acts הַיָּמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> age לְמַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> of the kings יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> Judah

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֥ב <S%H7901><s%> slept יְהוֹיָקִ֖ים <S%H3079><s%> So Jehoiakim עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֲבֹתָ֑יו <S%H1><s%> with his fathers וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigned יְהוֹיָכִ֥ין <S%H3078><s%> and Jehoiachin בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <S%H8478><s%> his place

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הֹסִ֥יף <S%H3254><s%> not again עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> again מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt לָצֵ֖את <S%H3318><s%> came מֵֽאַרְצ֑וֹ <S%H776><s%> any more out of his land כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לָקַ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> had taken מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> for the king בָּבֶ֗ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon מִנַּ֤חַל <S%H5158><s%> from the river מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against נְהַר־ <S%H5104><s%> unto the river פְּרָ֔ת <S%H6578><s%> Euphrates כֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> that הָיְתָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> belonged לְמֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> all that pertained to the king מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt פ

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old שְׁמֹנֶ֨ה <S%H8083><s%> eight עֶשְׂרֵ֤ה <S%H6240><s%> teen שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> years יְהוֹיָכִ֣ין <S%H3078><s%> Jehoiachin בְּמָלְכ֔וֹ <S%H4427><s%> when he began to reign וּשְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <S%H7969><s%> three חֳדָשִׁ֔ים <S%H2320><s%> months מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name אִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> And his mother's נְחֻשְׁתָּ֥א <S%H5179><s%> [was] Nehushta בַת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter אֶלְנָתָ֖ן <S%H494><s%> of Elnathan מִירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he did הָרַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כְּכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> had done אָבִֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> according to all that his father

בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> At that time הַהִ֔יא <S%H1931><s%> he [עָלָה כ] (עָל֗וּ <S%H5927><s%> arise ק) עַבְדֵ֛י <S%H5650><s%> the servants נְבֻכַדְנֶאצַּ֥ר <S%H5019><s%> of Nebuchadnezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king בָּבֶ֖ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> against Jerusalem וַתָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> came הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> and the city בַּמָּצֽוֹר׃ <S%H4692><s%> siege

וַיָּבֹ֛א <S%H935><s%> came נְבוּכַדְנֶאצַּ֥ר <S%H5019><s%> And Nebuchadnezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king בָּבֶ֖ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto הָעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> against the city וַעֲבָדָ֖יו <S%H5650><s%> and his servants צָרִ֥ים <S%H6696><s%> did besiege עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וַיֵּצֵ֞א <S%H3318><s%> went out יְהוֹיָכִ֤ין <S%H3078><s%> And Jehoiachin מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> to מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king בָּבֶ֔ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְאִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> he and his mother וַעֲבָדָ֖יו <S%H5650><s%> and his servants וְשָׂרָ֣יו <S%H8269><s%> and his princes וְסָֽרִיסָ֑יו <S%H5631><s%> and his officers וַיִּקַּ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> took אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and the king בָּבֶ֔ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon בִּשְׁנַ֥ת <S%H8141><s%> year שְׁמֹנֶ֖ה <S%H8083><s%> him in the eighth לְמָלְכֽוֹ׃ <S%H4427><s%> of his reign

וַיּוֹצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> And he carried out מִשָּׁ֗ם <S%H8033><s%> there אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אוֹצְרוֹת֙ <S%H214><s%> thence all the treasures בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְאֽוֹצְר֖וֹת <S%H214><s%> and the treasures בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king's וַיְקַצֵּ֞ץ <S%H7112><s%> and cut in pieces אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all כְּלֵ֣י <S%H3627><s%> all the vessels הַזָּהָ֗ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֜ה <S%H6213><s%> had made שְׁלֹמֹ֤ה <S%H8010><s%> which Solomon מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּהֵיכַ֣ל <S%H1964><s%> in the temple יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> had said יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD

וְהִגְלָ֣ה <S%H1540><s%> And he carried away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְ֠רוּשָׁלִַם <S%H3389><s%> all Jerusalem וְֽאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַשָּׂרִ֞ים <S%H8269><s%> and all the princes וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all גִּבּוֹרֵ֣י <S%H1368><s%> and all the mighty men הַחַ֗יִל <S%H2428><s%> of valour [עֲשָׂרָה כ] (עֲשֶׂ֤רֶת <S%H6235><s%> ten ק) אֲלָפִים֙ <S%H505><s%> thousand גּוֹלֶ֔ה <S%H1473><s%> captive וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הֶחָרָ֖שׁ <S%H2796><s%> and all the craftsmen וְהַמַּסְגֵּ֑ר <S%H4525><s%> and smiths לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> None נִשְׁאַ֔ר <S%H7604><s%> none remained זוּלַ֖ת <S%H2108><s%> save דַּלַּ֥ת <S%H1803><s%> the poorest sort עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> of the people הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the land

וַיֶּ֥גֶל <S%H1540><s%> And he carried away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוֹיָכִ֖ין <S%H3078><s%> Jehoiachin בָּבֶ֑לָה <S%H894><s%> to Babylon וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֵ֣ם <S%H517><s%> mother הַ֠מֶּלֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and the king's וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נְשֵׁ֨י <S%H802><s%> wives הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and the king's וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> סָרִיסָ֗יו <S%H5631><s%> and his officers וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> [אֱוִלֵי כ] (אֵילֵ֣י <S%H193><s%> mighty ק) הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land הוֹלִ֛יךְ <S%H1980><s%> led גּוֹלָ֥ה <S%H1473><s%> he into captivity מִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> from Jerusalem בָּבֶֽלָה׃ <S%H894><s%> to Babylon

וְאֵת֩ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All אַנְשֵׁ֨י <S%H582><s%> And all the men הַחַ֜יִל <S%H2428><s%> of might שִׁבְעַ֣ת <S%H7651><s%> [even] seven אֲלָפִ֗ים <S%H505><s%> thousand וְהֶחָרָ֤שׁ <S%H2796><s%> and craftsmen וְהַמַּסְגֵּר֙ <S%H4525><s%> and smiths אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> a thousand הַכֹּ֕ל <S%H3605><s%> all גִּבּוֹרִ֖ים <S%H1368><s%> all [that were] strong עֹשֵׂ֣י <S%H6213><s%> [and] apt מִלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> for war וַיְבִיאֵ֧ם <S%H935><s%> brought מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> even them the king בָּבֶ֛ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon גּוֹלָ֖ה <S%H1473><s%> captive בָּבֶֽלָה׃ <S%H894><s%> to Babylon

וַיַּמְלֵ֧ךְ <S%H4427><s%> king מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> And the king בָּבֶ֛ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַתַּנְיָ֥ה <S%H4983><s%> made Mattaniah דֹד֖וֹ <S%H1730><s%> his father's brother תַּחְתָּ֑יו <S%H8478><s%> his place וַיַּסֵּ֥ב <S%H5437><s%> in his stead and changed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name צִדְקִיָּֽהוּ׃ <S%H6667><s%> to Zedekiah פ

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old עֶשְׂרִ֨ים <S%H6242><s%> [was] twenty וְאַחַ֤ת <S%H259><s%> and one שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> years צִדְקִיָּ֣הוּ <S%H6667><s%> Zedekiah בְמָלְכ֔וֹ <S%H4427><s%> when he began to reign וְאַחַ֤ת <S%H259><s%> a עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <S%H6240><s%> ten שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name אִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> And his mother's [חֲמִיטַל כ] (חֲמוּטַ֥ל <S%H2537><s%> Hamutal ק) בַּֽת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <S%H3414><s%> of Jeremiah מִלִּבְנָֽה׃ <S%H3841><s%> of Libnah

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he did הָרַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כְּכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> had done יְהוֹיָקִֽים׃ <S%H3079><s%> according to all that Jehoiakim

כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> For עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> through אַ֣ף <S%H639><s%> For through the anger יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הָיְתָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> came בִירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> it came to pass in Jerusalem וּבִ֣יהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> and Judah עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הִשְׁלִכ֥וֹ <S%H7993><s%> until he had cast them out אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> through פָּנָ֑יו <S%H6440><s%> from his presence וַיִּמְרֹ֥ד <S%H4775><s%> rebelled צִדְקִיָּ֖הוּ <S%H6667><s%> that Zedekiah בְּמֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> against the king בָּבֶֽל׃ <S%H894><s%> of Babylon ס
